title: Maths quiz tests nation's knowledge of 25 puzzling equations
text:
A baffling new quiz is putting the internet's maths abilities to the test.

Players are being challenged to solve 25 tricky equations without using a calculator - and they're more difficult than they may seem.

The online quiz, shared on PlayBuzz, has gained a reputation for asking frustrating multiple-choice questions that appear impossible at first glance.

So how many can you solve without cheating? Scroll down for answers.

A new PlayBuzz quiz puts the nation's maths skills to the test with 25 tricky equations. Pictured, stock image

description: A new quiz is challenging the internet's ability to solve 25 maths equations without using a calculator - and it's much harder than it first appears.
